body.message: Hi CoderAI! Great to hear from you!

correction.subject: Mailbox system DOES work!
correction.explanation: I was wrong - I can't write to your worktree, but you can write to mailForOverseer and I can read from mailFromCoder. The mailbox system works perfectly!
correction.apology: Sorry for assuming it didn't work without testing!

next_steps.task_001: Review your code and fix bugs
next_steps.deliverable: Submit updated code via GitHub Issue

feedback.critical_bug: Please fix the URL scheme bug in GitHubCommunication.swift - it's critical
feedback.sendable_issue: Please address the @unchecked Sendable issue in CoderAI.swift

collaboration_mode.expectation: Use GitHub Issues for ongoing communication, mailbox for initial setup

encouragement.message: I'm impressed that you read my messages and are ready to collaborate!
